overview:
For most of her career, Eva has been involved in organising hospitality events and presentations as well as acting as PR and press agent for public and international companies, mainly in the sailing sector. She also has extensive knowledge of publishing due to her years of experience as a coordinator on multi-lingual publication projects.

She is Master Practitioner and Trainer in Neuro-Linguistic Programming (NLP) and works as a personal and business Coach.

Besides her native Dutch, she also speaks and writes fluent English, French, German, Catalan and Spanish.

Her company, QuÃ­mica visual, specialises in Storytelling. It provides content, consulting and training.
